name: The Great Canadian Bucket List 2nd Edition
categories: The Great Canadian Bucket List 2nd Edition
description: This isn’t your typical travel guide – it’s an inspirational, definitive national bucket list. Discover over 70 of the extraordinary places to see and activities to do (and can only do) in Canada before you die, compiled by travel writer and host Robin Esrock. The Great Canadian Bucket List is written for both locals and visitors, and unlocks an accompanying website filled with practical info, videos and recommendations for hotels, restaurants and tour operators, so you can put your plan into action. The toughest part is choosing what to do first.
